trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref> Web-server control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"> </xref> controle de servidor Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control displays a user interface that allows a user to log on to the host Web site.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>controle exibe uma interface do usuário que permite que um usuário faça logon no site do host.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer visual, quando você alternar de origem para o modo de Design, o código-fonte marcação que descreve o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>controle é analisado e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando você alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é persistente para o código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The LoginDesigner class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe LoginDesigner fornece suporte de tempo de design para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: The LoginDesigner class properties provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades da classe LoginDesigner fornecerem a seguinte funcionalidade: - o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.ActionLists%2A>propriedade retorna um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objeto, que normalmente contém um objeto que é derivado do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>classe para cada nível na árvore de herança do designer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property returns a collection of formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>propriedade retorna uma coleção de esquemas para exibição de formatação de **AutoFormatação** caixa de diálogo.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property returns a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control and the top-level <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> template.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>propriedade retorna uma coleção de grupos de modelo para os campos de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>controle e nível superior <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>modelo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>propriedade sempre retorna `true`, indicando que o designer cria uma cópia temporária do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The LoginDesigner class methods provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos da classe LoginDesigner fornecerem a seguinte funcionalidade: - o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>método retorna a marcação que é usada para renderizar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>em tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method returns a serialized copy of the template for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>método retorna uma cópia serializada do modelo para o associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method provides the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> at design time when an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>método fornece a marcação que é usada para renderizar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>em tempo de design, quando um erro ocorreu.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.Initialize%2A>método prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to remove properties from, add additional properties to, or shadow properties of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>método é usado para remover propriedades da, adicionar propriedades adicionais ou propriedades de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> de sombra</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method sets a region of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> from a serialized copy of a control template.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>método define uma região do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>de uma cópia serializada de um modelo de controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner>classe quando ele cria associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>controle ou uma cópia desse controle na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action-list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de designer da lista de ações para este designer.

trans-unit.source: The ActionLists property creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner> class, adds it to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object that is obtained from the ActionLists base property, and then returns the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ActionLists cria um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>objeto para a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner>classe, adiciona-o para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objeto que é obtido da propriedade ActionLists base e, em seguida, retorna o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> associado a este designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner"></xref> control allows resizing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner"> </xref> permite o controle de redimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.RenderOuterTable%2A> property is set to `false`, the control does not allow resizing.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.RenderOuterTable%2A>está definida como `false`, o controle não permitir o redimensionamento.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.RenderOuterTable%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control allows resizing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle permite redimensionamento; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of predefined formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de formatação predefinidas esquemas para exibir o **AutoFormatação** caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> object is populated from an XML-encoded member of an internal class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>objeto é preenchido com um membro codificados em XML de uma classe interna</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref> that contains the predefined schemes for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"> </xref> que contém os esquemas predefinidos para a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time and populates a collection of designer regions.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação que é usada para renderizar o controle associado em tempo de design e preenche uma coleção de regiões de designer.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml method creates an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control and adds it to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection> object that is referenced by the `regions` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método GetDesignTimeHtml cria um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion>de objeto para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>propriedade associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>controlar e adiciona-o para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection>objeto é referenciado pelo `regions` parâmetro.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion>

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> base method to generate the markup for the design-time rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: O método GetDesignTimeHtml usa o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>base do método para gerar a marcação para o processamento de tempo de design do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref> to which definitions of the selectable and clickable regions in the design-time view of the control are added.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"> </xref> quais definições das regiões selecionáveis e clicáveis na exibição de tempo de design do controle são adicionados.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the markup used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres contendo a marcação usada para renderizar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"> </xref> em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Returns a serialized copy of the template that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma cópia serializada do modelo que é usado para renderizar o controle associado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The GetEditableDesignerRegionContent method creates a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A> object of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control in the control container and returns a serialized copy.
trans-unit.target: O método GetEditableDesignerRegionContent cria uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>objeto associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>controle no contêiner de controle e retorna uma cópia serializada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The serialized template can be restored to a part of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O modelo serializado pode ser restaurado para uma parte do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>controlar usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: The `region` parameter is not used by the GetEditableDesignerRegionContent.
trans-unit.target: O `region` parâmetro não for usado, o GetEditableDesignerRegionContent.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref> for which to fetch content.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"> </xref> para o qual buscar o conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: A string containing a serialized copy of the template used to render the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém uma cópia serializada do modelo usado para renderizar associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"> </xref> em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Provides the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time when an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a marcação que é usada para renderizar o controle associado em tempo de design quando ocorreu um erro.

trans-unit.source: The placeholder that the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control renders contains the type name, the control name, and messages announcing and describing the error.
trans-unit.target: O espaço reservado que o tempo de design <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>controle processa contém o nome do tipo, o nome do controle e mensagens anunciando e descrevendo o erro.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that was thrown.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Exception>que foi lançada.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the markup used to render the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref> at design time after an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a marcação usada para renderizar associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"> </xref> em tempo de design depois que um erro ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The visual designer calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: O designer visual chama o método Initialize quando ele estiver pronto para usar o designer para processar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O método Initialize e seus métodos base configurar propriedades e configurar eventos que são necessários para a operação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: O `component` parâmetro é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>controle associado este designer ou uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref>, that implements an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"> </xref>, que implementa um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Usado pelo designer para remover propriedades da ou adicionar propriedades adicionais para a exibição no **propriedades** grade ou a propriedades de sombra do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Designers de controle usam métodos que são derivados do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método sombra várias propriedades de controle com as propriedades de tempo de design correspondentes que implementa o designer, e para adicionar ou remover propriedades do **propriedades** grade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A> property has been defined for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control, the PreFilterProperties sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute> attribute of properties that do not apply when templated to `false` so those properties do not appear in the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>propriedade foi definida para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>controlar os conjuntos de PreFilterProperties a <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>atributo de propriedades que não se aplicam ao modelo para `false` para essas propriedades não são exibidas no **propriedades** grade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the added and shadowed properties.
trans-unit.target: Implementando uma coleção de <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>das propriedades adicionadas e sombreadas.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner"></xref> control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner"> </xref> controle usa um contêiner de tabela externa para aplicar regras de estilo CSS embutida.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner> control uses an outer table container to apply inline style rule in the markup.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner>controle usa um contêiner de tabela externa para aplicar a regra de estilo embutido na marcação.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner>

trans-unit.source: You can remove the outer table container by setting this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Você pode remover o contêiner de tabela externa definindo essa propriedade como `true`.

trans-unit.source: Removing the outer table gives you greater flexibility in how you apply CSS rules to the markup that is rendered by the control.
trans-unit.target: Remover tabela externa fornece maior flexibilidade em como aplicar as regras de CSS para a marcação que é processada pelo controle.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle usa um contêiner de tabela externa para aplicar regras de estilo CSS embutida; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets a region of the associated control from a serialized copy of a control template.
trans-unit.target: Define uma região do controle associado de uma cópia serializada de um modelo de controle.

trans-unit.source: The SetEditableDesignerRegionContent method parses a serialized template for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control that is specified by the `content` parameter, and then uses the template to update the region of the control that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Name%2A> property of the `region` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método SetEditableDesignerRegionContent analisa um modelo serializado para associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>controle que é especificado pelo `content` parâmetro e, em seguida, usa o modelo para atualizar a região do controle que é especificado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Name%2A>propriedade o `region` parâmetro.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Name%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control can be serialized using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>controle pode ser serializado usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref> that provides the name of the region to update.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"> </xref> que fornece o nome da região para atualizar.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a serialized template for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém um modelo serializado para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de grupos de modelos para os campos do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The TemplateGroups property gets a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection> object from the TemplateGroups base property, and then adds a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> object that contains a single <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> object for the layout template of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade TemplateGroups obtém um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>objeto da propriedade TemplateGroups base e, em seguida, adiciona um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>objeto que contém um único <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>objeto para o modelo de layout do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>controle para <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> associado</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>

trans-unit.source: The TemplateGroups property returns this <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection> to the caller.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade TemplateGroups retorna isso <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>ao chamador.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection"></xref> containing an element for each templated field in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection"> </xref> que contém um elemento para cada campo modelo de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer deve usar uma cópia temporária em vez do controle real associada com o designer para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Because the UsePreviewControl property is always `true`, the designer <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property returns a copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Porque a propriedade UsePreviewControl é sempre `true`, o designer <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>propriedade retorna uma cópia do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>controle para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property creates the copy by persisting the actual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control, then parsing the persisted control string.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>propriedade cria a cópia, persistindo real <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>controle, em seguida, analisar a cadeia de caracteres de controle persistente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The copied control does not affect any persistence for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>.
trans-unit.target: O controle copiado não afeta qualquer persistência para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: If the UsePreviewControl property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer uses the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control will persist to the page markup source.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade UsePreviewControl foi substituída para retornar `false`, o designer usa associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>para gerar a marcação de tempo de design e alterações em tempo de design para o controle será mantido para a origem de marcação da página.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
